name: Beat-y Treatment
description:
Beat-y Treatment was a two week project for Game Specialist Course 2014. Our inspiration was NES classic River City Ransom.

The idea is go to get a beauty treatment but our hero lost his job and is out of money so he decided to take money from street thugs.

Controls (does not support controller):

Move: WASD
Jump: DOWN
Hit : LEFT
Backspace : Back from credits etc.
Esc : Back to title
Return/Enter: Select/OK
